definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: He repeatedly stressed his commitment to open trade between the U.S. and Canada.
sentences.chinese: 他再次強調了對開放美加貿易的承諾。

sentences.english: The second day will go to Paris pear son clothing, determined to find the U.
sentences.chinese: 第二天將要去巴黎的梨衣子，決意去找美加。

sentences.english: The St. Clair River empties Lake Huron on the U. S. -Canada border.
sentences.chinese: 聖克萊爾河在美加邊境注入休倫湖。

sentences.english: Her works have been exhibited in both the USA and Canada.
sentences.chinese: 作品曾在美加多處展出。

sentences.english: Trouble is, some differences between the two countries are culturally ingrained .
sentences.chinese: 問題是，這種不同根植於美加兩國的文化。

definition: United States/name of a country that formerly existed near Samarkand
abbr. for Macao 澳門|澳门/abbr. for Australia 澳大利亞|澳大利亚
